symptoms_normalized: hallucinations (seeing or hearing things that aren't there), delusions (false beliefs), disorganized speech, disorganized or catatonic behavior, negative symptoms (lack of emotion, social withdrawal)
normalized_symptoms_list: ["hallucinations (seeing or hearing things that aren't there)", 'delusions (false beliefs)', 'disorganized speech', 'disorganized or catatonic behavior', 'negative symptoms (lack of emotion', 'social withdrawal)']

symptoms: tremor at rest (pill-rolling), slowness of movement (bradykinesia), limb rigidity, gait and balance problems, shuffling walk
treatment: medications to increase dopamine (levodopa), physical and occupational therapy, deep brain stimulation
symptoms_normalized: tremor at rest (pill-rolling), slowness of movement (bradykinesia), limb rigidity, gait and balance problems, shuffling walk
normalized_symptoms_list: ['tremor at rest (pill-rolling)', 'slowness of movement (bradykinesia)', 'limb rigidity', 'gait and balance problems', 'shuffling walk']

symptoms: progressive memory loss, difficulty with problem-solving and planning, confusion with time or place, trouble understanding visual images, problems with words in speaking or writing, personality changes
treatment: medications to manage symptoms (cholinesterase inhibitors, memantine), supportive care, creating a safe environment

normalized_symptoms_list: ['progressive memory loss', 'difficulty with problem-solving and planning', 'confusion with time or place', 'trouble understanding visual images', 'problems with words in speaking or writing', 'personality changes']

symptoms: recurrent, unprovoked seizures, which can manifest as temporary confusion, staring spells, uncontrollable jerking movements, or loss of consciousness
treatment: anti-seizure medications, vagus nerve stimulation, ketogenic diet, surgery to remove seizure focus

normalized_symptoms_list: ['recurrent', 'unprovoked seizures', 'which can manifest as temporary confusion', 'staring spells', 'uncontrollable jerking movements', 'or loss of consciousness']

symptoms: numbness or weakness in one or more limbs, partial or complete loss of vision, tingling or pain, electric-shock sensations with neck movements, fatigue, dizziness, problems with bowel and bladder function

symptoms: fatigue, fever, joint pain, butterfly-shaped rash on the face, skin lesions that worsen with sun exposure, shortness of breath, chest pain, dry eyes
